name: Space Dance (itch)
description:
This is an old-school twin-stick arcade shooter where enemies spawn to the beat of the music. It's hard to notice, but I timed it that way in the Unity editor.

I tried to make this casual enough to fit into your lunch break. If you don't lose before that, each level is the length of one song, so about 2-3 minutes per round.

This should be easy to get going. But it'll be challenging to finish the level and I dare you to top my highscore (402400).

My new link-gun mechanic allows you to balance between an increased score multiplier and the risk of keeping more enemies alive. More risk means more rewards, so the only way to get a good score is to play with maximum difficulty.

Controls

WASD + Arrow Keys + Space

or use any gamepad with two sticks and a bumper trigger

Higher Resolution

There's a Windows version you can download for better graphics.

Leaderboards

FYI, the itch.io version is free, but it doesn't have a server for online rankings. There's also a $1 Steam version that uses the Steam leaderboards. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1103870/Space_Dance/
